details.arabic_diacless: اللٰهم إني أعوذ بك من عذاب القبر، ومن عذاب جهنم، ومن فتنة المحيا والممات، ومن شر فتنة المسيح الدجال
details.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ إِنِّيْ أَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذَابِ الْقَبْرِ، وَمِنْ عَذَابِ جَهَنَّمَ، وَمِنْ فِتْنَةِ الْمَحْيَا وَالْمَمَاتِ، وَمِنْ شَرِّ فِتْنَةِ الْمَسِيْحِ الدَّجَّالِ
details.transliteration: Allaahumma 'innee 'a'oo<u>th</u>u bika min l'a<u>th</u>aabil-qabri, wa min 'a<u>th</u>aabi jahannama, wa min fitnatil-mahyaa walmamaati, wa min sharri fitnatil-maseehid-dajjaal.
details.translations: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the grave, and from the punishment of Hell-fire, and from the trials of life and death, and from the evil of the trial of the False Messiah.
details.reference: Al-Bukhari 2/102, Muslim 1/412, and this is Muslim's wording.

pageTitle: Protection from punishment of the grave, trials of life, death & Dajjal
